com.jdroid.android.billing
Class BillingService

java.lang.Object
  android.content.Context
      android.content.ContextWrapper
          android.app.Service
              roboguice.service.RoboService
                  com.jdroid.android.billing.BillingService
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, roboguice.util.ScopedObjectMapProvider
public class BillingService
extends roboguice.service.RoboService

This class sends messages to the Google Play app on behalf of the application by connecting (binding) to the MarketBillingService. The application creates an instance of this class and invokes billing requests through this service. This service also reports state changes back to the application through the BillingResponseHandler The BillingReceiver class starts this service to process commands that it receives from the Google Play app.

onStartCommand

public int onStartCommand(android.content.Intent intent,
                          int flags,
                          int startId)
The BillingReceiver sends messages to this service using intents. Each intent has an action and some extra arguments specific to that action.

Overrides:
onStartCommand in class android.app.Service
Parameters:
intent - the intent containing one of the supported actions
startId - an identifier for the invocation instance of this service
See Also:
Service.onStartCommand(android.content.Intent, int, int)
